review: I thought this was great, it worked well, made the berries all very uniform. I washed it by hand, went to use it again and the pin had fallen out. I looked all over for it and couldn't find it, until I used my garbage disposal. UGH. The pin needs to be bent on each side instead of straight.
productTitle: Strawberry Corer Slicer Combo Set - Time-saving Gadget to Creating Healthy Dish
